Material used.Description: Da-Gal4-directed ubiquitous or TH-Gal4-directed DN-specific co-expression of pathogenic dLRRK(I1915T) or hLRRK2(G2019S) in flies.

Readout description.Result Description: Pathogenic hLRRK2(G2019S) stimulated reporter expression more than WT proteins, indicating suppression of let-7 miRNA function.
Pathogenic hLRRK2(I2020T) suppressed the inhibitory effect of let-7 on reporter expression in HEK293T cells.
Mutant hLRRK2(R1441G) had no effect on let-7 miRNA function.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated with multiple independent fly cohorts or cell cultures (n=3).

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 proteins were used as a control for comparison with pathogenic variants.

Basic negative control.Description: Kinase-dead forms of LRRK2 (3KD) were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Unpaired Student's t-tests for two groups and one-way ANOVA for more than two groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Reporter expression levels comparable to wild-type LRRK2 controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant increase in reporter expression compared to wild-type LRRK2 controls (P<0.05).

Material used.Description: Fly head extracts and HEK293T cell extracts were used for Western blot analysis of protein levels.

Readout description.Result Description: Upregulation of E2F1 and DP by hLRRK2(G2019S) in fly head extracts.
hLRRK2(I2020T) promoted association of phospho-4E-BP1 with hAgo2 in HEK293T cells.
No significant effect described for hLRRK2(R1441G) in Western blot analysis.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 or control genotypes were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Tubulin or other loading controls were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Unpaired Student's t-tests for two groups and one-way ANOVA for more than two groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels comparable to wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant increase or decrease in protein levels compared to wild-type controls (P<0.05).

Material used.Description: Fly head extracts and HEK293T cell extracts were used for co-immunoprecipitation assays.

Readout description.Result Description: hLRRK2(G2019S) associated with hAgo2 in HEK293T cells and with dAgo1 in fly head extracts.
hLRRK2(I2020T) likely associated with hAgo2, though specific results not detailed for this variant.
No specific association or effect described for hLRRK2(R1441G) in co-IP assays.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a control for comparison.

Basic negative control.Description: Kinase-dead LRRK2 (3KD) was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No significant association with RISC components compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant association with RISC components like hAgo2 or dAgo1.
